meanings.definition: A woody perennial plant, typically having a single stem or trunk growing to a considerable height and bearing lateral branches at some distance from the ground.
meanings.sent1: The tall trees swayed gently in the breeze.
meanings.sent2: I love walking in the forest surrounded by trees.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous squirrel played hide-and-seek among the trees.
meanings.sent4: Her mind was a forest of thoughts, each tree representing a different idea.
meanings.sent5: The ancient trees whispered secrets to those who listened closely.

meanings.definition: A wooden structure or part of a structure.
meanings.sent1: The carpenter crafted a beautiful table from the finest trees.
meanings.sent2: The old barn had sturdy trees supporting its roof.
meanings.sent3: The children built a fort using fallen trees from the backyard.
meanings.sent4: His family tree traced back generations of hardworking individuals.
meanings.sent5: The trees of the house creaked in the wind, adding to the eerie atmosphere.
